thumb.title: 【睡眠用BGM】 - ASMR / BGM for Sleep - ASMR
thumb.description: 睡眠用BGMです。寝るときにでも、聴いてみてください。時間は長いですよ。素材は以下から使わせていただきました。画像 PexelsでのMahdi Bafandeによる写真https://www.pexels.com/ja-jp/photo/13800327/ 音 Soothing Sounds of Plastic: ASMR Recording with Zoom H6 Recorderhttps://freesound.org/s/685331/ 作成に使用したソフトApowerEdithttps://www.apowersoft.jp/video-editor------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------This is BGM for sleep.You can listen to it when you sleep.The time is long.The material was used from the following.Images Photo by Mahdi Bafande at Pexelshttps://www.pexels.com/ja-jp/photo/13800327/ Sound Soothing Sounds of Plastic: ASMR Recording with Zoom H6 Recorderhttps://freesound.org/s/685331/ Software used for creationApowerEdithttps://www.apowersoft.jp/video-editor
